testcase.classname: facebook application smoke test automation scripts
testcase.name: verify the login functinality of the application with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in facebook applications...............................passed Then user should see the facebook logo displayed in the header..............passed When user enter the email address in the emailfield in login page...........passed And user enter the password in the password field in the login page.........passed And user click on the login button in the login page........................passed And user wait for 3 seconds for page load...................................passed Then user should see the login into facebook title in the forgot password page.passed
